functional_units.name: Integrity Summary ViewModel Sorting
functional_units.description: Provides deterministic multi-field offset and affected-node sorting for integrity summaries in CLI/UI.

functional_units.name: Explorer Outline Expansion
functional_units.description: Expands ancestor nodes when navigating to an integrity issue and returns focus to the selected node.

functional_units.name: Affected Node Selection
functional_units.description: Automatically selects affected nodes in the explorer outline upon choosing an integrity issue.

functional_units.name: Issues Only Toggle
functional_units.description: UI toggle that filters the explorer view to show only integrity issues.

functional_units.name: Issue Navigation Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+Shift+E / Cmd+Shift+Option+E) for navigating between integrity issues using new navigation helpers.
